      • process

        public PublisherConfig process(PublishStatus status)
                        throws DotPublishingException
        Final step on the Publishing of a Bundle. This method will generate the Bundle file compressing all the information
        generated by the Bundlers into a tar.gz file what will live on the assets directory, after the Bundle is created
        this process will try to send the Bundle to a list of previously selected Environments.
        Specified by:
        process in interface IPublisher
        Specified by:
        process in class Publisher
        Parameters:
        status - Current status of the Publishing process
        Returns:
        This bundle configuration (PublisherConfig)
        Throws:
        DotPublishingException
        See Also:
        Environment
